Detailed Description

CXLWidget Pretty much identical to CXLComponent but offers a little bit of extra functionality.

Forced to not be a descendent of {

See also:
CIXComponent} because of the depth of the {
CInputWidget} heirarchy. Thus this object duplicates {
CXLComponent}.
